scenario.sendRequestSIP: INVITE sip:[HardAddressUAS] SIP/2.0 Call-ID: [NewCallID] CSeq: [NewCseq] INVITE From: "[InviterName]" <sip:[LocalAddressUAC]>;tag=[localTag] To: "[InviteeName]" <sip:[HardAddressUAS]> Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [LocalAddressUAC];branch=z9hG4bK[newBranchId] Max-Forwards: 10 Route: <sip:[Adresse-Proxy];lr> Contact: "[InviterName]"<sip:[LocalAddressUAC]> Content-Type: application/sdp User-Agent: [UserAgent] Content-Length: 0

then.log: Proxy sends 100 - trying when he receives a request (Stateful Proxy propertie)

else.log: Proxy doesn't send 100 - trying when he receives a request (Stateless Proxy propertie)
